Hello,

As seen in the picture, I can't get those two parts to attatch... What to do?

Edited January 20, 2014 by Alpheratz

the parts wont attach because there is no attachment node there, if you are using a subassembly ( as i suspect you are) you need to build it such that the root part of the subassembly has an attachment node in the proper location.
Do you mean the root part of my subassembly should be a clamp-o-tron?

Take a clamp o torn as a single piece, attach it, then attach the fuel tank to it,

Oh, and I don't think fuel goes through command pods iirc, so you might want to switch the fuel tank and command pod
Like this? It wouldn't work

Do you mean the root part of my subassembly should be a clamp-o-tron?

Exactly. Build your subassembly separate from the rest of your rocket. I use a modular girder segment as my root ship part, then build the subassembly from there with the proper orientation (Starting with the part I want to attach) then just pull off the part to attach and drop it in the subassembly tab. Voila! a perfectly formatted subassembly.
